ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Alfred W. Crosby, Asim A. Jani, Grayson B. Miller, Myron G. Schultz, and Jack Woodall for critical comments; Philip McEldowney for literature search/retrieval; Stefanie Nauhardt Parker for translation; Mariana Ruiz-Villarreal and David Connell for providing the leptospiral life cycle; and Reina Tejano and Samuel de Champlain for providing the maps.
